item.description:
This event was recomended by a member as a fun way to spend an afternoon so we figured why not we are "The Fun Singles"!

The event will be held aboard the Frederick L Nolan Jr.

The Cruise will depart Bostons Long Warf at 2:00 and return at 5:00.

The tickets are $20 and can be purchased on line by following this link we will not be purchasing the tickets so if you RSVP "Yes" you need to go purchase your own ticket.
http://www.chadlamars...

I hope you can join us for an afternoon of good friends and great music
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet near the boat at 1:00
item.name: The Chad LaMarsh Band Bacardi Party Cruise
